title: Air Conditioning, Rain Showerhead, Smart TV
posting_body: ['Set along tree-lined streets with a breathtaking mountain backdrop, we offer 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments and townhomes for rent in Spring Valley, Las Vegas, Nevada.', 'Our luxury community seamlessly blends distinct and contemporary architecture, modern living spaces, and resort-inspired services and amenities to create an environment to complement your unique lifestyle.', '-BBQ and Picnic Areas Throughout', '-Carport Assigned', '-Short-Term Leases Available', '-Ceiling Fans in Every Room', '-Coffee Cafe Serving Starbucks Coffee Daily', '-Luxury Clubhouse', '-Modern Lighting', '-Our apartment homes are cleaned only with organic products!', '-Refrigerator', '-Playground and Splashpad', '-State-of-the-Art Fitness Center with Water Bottle and Towel Service', '-Stainless-Steel & Energy-Efficient Appliances', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
